dcterms:creator: Vineet Kumar
Sachindra Joshi
dcterms:description: UDC is a closed domain dataset based on the Ubuntu Chat Logs, consisting of 8.6M turns built of 168.7M words. It is noisy and may contain responses that are only URLs, with users potentially typing several consecutive responses.
dcterms:title: UDC

dcterms:creator: Oriol Vinyals
Quoc V. Le
dcterms:description: OpenSubtitles consists of conversations from movie manuscripts and can be viewed as an open domain dataset since there are no restrictions on topics. It contains 2.7M sentences built of 19M words.
dcterms:title: OpenSubtitles
